name: MRILumbarSpineProcedures
title: MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
